alert.note: Alert for Houston; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Winona, northern Houston, La Crosse, southwestern Jackson, northwestern Monroe and southeastern Trempealeau Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brice Prairie, or 9 miles north of La Crescent, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... West Salem around 330 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include North Side Of La Crosse, Blue Bird Campground, New Hartford, Mindoro and Barre Mills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 259 and 276. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
